author: moishe11
title: A nice alternative
review: Benthomaar is a beautiful fig, and so it's a shame he only comes in a £100 set. This foil pack provides a nice alternative to the set. The minifig has some incredibly detailed printing and the weapon is alright. Nothing crazy parts wise (besides the fig), it's a magazine promotion so that's to be expected, but if you want Bentho but don't want to buy the set he comes in, I recommend getting this set.
